title: Decimal point
content: Define the decimal point operator and the decimal fraction constructor. This can model traditional decimal point notation, and serve as a convenient way to write some fractional numbers. See ~ df-dp and ~ df-dp2 for more information; ~ dpval2 and ~ dpfrac1 provide a more convenient way to obtain a value. This is intentionally similar to ~ df-dec .

blocks.name: cdp
blocks.content: Decimal point operator. See ~ df-dp .
blocks.origin: const class cdp { . }

blocks.name: diff.cdp.s
diff.cdp.c
diff.cdp.w
df-dp
blocks.content: Define the ` . ` (decimal point) operator. For example, ` ( 1 . 5 ) = ( 3 / 2 ) ` , and ` -u ( ; 3 2 . _ 7 _ 1 8 ) = -u ( ; ; ; ; 3 2 7 1 8 / ; ; ; 1 0 0 0 ) ` Unary minus, if applied, should normally be applied in front of the parentheses. Metamath intentionally does not have a built-in construct for numbers, so it can show that numbers are something you can build based on set theory. However, that means that Metamath has no built-in way to parse and handle decimal numbers as traditionally written, e.g., "2.54". Here we create a system for modeling traditional decimal point notation; it is not syntactically identical, but it is sufficiently similar so it is a reasonable model of decimal point notation. It should also serve as a convenient way to write some fractional numbers. The RHS is ` RR ` , not ` QQ ` ; this should simplify some proofs. The LHS is ` NN0 ` , since that is what is used in practice. The definition intentionally does not allow negative numbers on the LHS; if it did, nonzero fractions would produce the wrong results. (It would be possible to define the decimal point to do this, but using it would be more complicated, and the expression ` -u ( A . B ) ` is just as convenient.) (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: dpval
blocks.content: Define the value of the decimal point operator. See ~ df-dp . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdp2(c0, c1)))
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, cr, cdp, cdp2(c0, c1), cdp2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  syl5eq(cdp2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-dp2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  syl6eqr(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), cdp2(c0, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  df-dp(hs0, hs1)
  ovexi(cdp2(c0, c1), c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cdp2(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cdp2(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpval(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→(c0[.]c1)= _(c0, c1))
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, cr, cdp, _(c0, c1), _(hs0, hs1), (c0[+](hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0))))
  syl5eq(_(hs0, hs1), (c0[+](hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0))), (hs0[+](hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0))), hs0 = c0)
  df-dp2(hs0, hs1)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, caddc, (hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
  syl6eqr((c0[+](hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0))), _(c0, c1), (c0[+](c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))), hs1 = c1)
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, (hs1[÷]cdc(1, 0)), (c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)), hs1 = c1)
  oveq1(hs1, c1, cdiv, cdc(1, 0))
  df-dp(hs0, hs1)
  ovexi(_(c0, c1), c0, caddc, (c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(_(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(_(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: dpcl
blocks.content: Prove that the closure of the decimal point is ` RR ` as we have defined it. See ~ df-dp . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: dpfrac1
blocks.content: Prove a simple equivalence involving the decimal point. See ~ df-dp and ~ dpcl . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpfrac1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cdp, c1), co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
} = {
  3eqtr4a(co(c0, cdp, c1), co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdp2(c0, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr)))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  dpval(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  nn0cn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  syl5eq(co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1i(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1))
  dfdec10(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wcel(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cc))
  mulcld(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc))
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  mp3an3(wcel(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wa(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  divdir(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  oveq1d(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), c0), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  recni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  gt0ne0ii(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10re()
  10pos()
  divcan3(c0, cdc(nat1, nat0))
}

blocks.name: dpmul10
blocks.content: Multiply by 10 a decimal expansion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpmul10(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, cdp, c1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdc(c0, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cr)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(co(co(c0, cdp, c1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdc(c0, c1), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1))
  oveq2i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), c1)
  divcan2i(cdc(nat1, nat0), c1)
  3eqtr3i(co(co(c0, cdp, c1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c0, cdp, c1)), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  oveq2i(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, co(c0, cdp, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  dpval2(c0, c1)
  mulcomi(cdc(nat1, nat0), co(c0, cdp, c1))
  recni(co(c0, cdp, c1))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, cdp, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr))
  dpcl(c0, c1)
  adddii(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  nn0cni(c0)
  divcli(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(c1)
  nncni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nnne0i(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
  dfdec10(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: decdiv10
blocks.content: Divide a decimal number by 10. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm decdiv10(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c0, cdp, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cr)
} = {
  eqtr3i(co(cdc(c0, c1), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c0, cdp, c1), co(co(co(c0, cdp, c1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  oveq1i(co(co(c0, cdp, c1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(c0, c1))
  dpmul10(c0, c1)
  divcan4i(co(c0, cdp, c1), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(co(c0, cdp, c1))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, cdp, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cr))
  dpcl(c0, c1)
  nncni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nnne0i(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm decdiv10(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (cdc(c0, c1)[÷]cdc(1, 0))=(c0[.]c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ℝ
} = {
  eqtr3i((cdc(c0, c1)[÷]cdc(1, 0)), (c0[.]c1), (((c0[.]c1)[×]cdc(1, 0))[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
  oveq1i(((c0[.]c1)[×]cdc(1, 0)), cdiv, cdc(1, 0), cdc(c0, c1))
  dpmul10(c0, c1)
  divcan4i((c0[.]c1), cdc(1, 0))
  recni((c0[.]c1))
  mp2an((c0[.]c1)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  dpcl(c0, c1)
  nncni(cdc(1, 0))
  nnne0i(cdc(1, 0))
  10nn()
}

blocks.name: dpmul100
blocks.content: Multiply by 100 a decimal expansion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpmul100(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)), cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
} = {
  3eqtr3ri(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)), cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), co(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  mulassi(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  eqeltri(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cc, co(c0, caddc, co(cdp2(c1, c2), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  dpval2(c0, cdp2(c1, c2))
  addcli(c0, co(cdp2(c1, c2), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  divcli(cdp2(c1, c2), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nnne0i(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
  3eqtr2ri(co(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), co(co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdc(c1, c2)), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(cdp2(c1, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  dfdec100(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq12i(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(cdp2(c1, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), cdc(c1, c2))
  eqtri(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), cmul, c0), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, c0))
  mul32i(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  oveq1i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, c0, cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  eqtr3i(co(cdp2(c1, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdc(c1, c2), co(co(c1, cdp, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  oveq1i(co(c1, cdp, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0), cdp2(c1, c2))
  dpval3(c1, c2)
  dpmul10(c1, c2)
  eqtr2i(co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(cdp2(c1, c2), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  oveq1i(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)))
  eqtri(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)), cdc(c0, cdp2(c1, c2)))
  dpmul10(c0, cdp2(c1, c2))
  dfdec10(c0, cdp2(c1, c2))
  adddiri(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), cdp2(c1, c2), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mulcli(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
  recni(cdp2(c1, c2))
  mp2an(wcel(cdp2(c1, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  nn0rei(c1)
  dp2cl(c1, c2)
  nn0cni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  oveq2i(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  dec0u(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn0()
}

blocks.name: dp3mul10
blocks.content: Multiply by 10 a decimal expansion with 3 digits. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp3mul10(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(cdc(c0, c1), cdp, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
} = {
  3eqtri(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, c2)), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(cdc(c0, c1), cdp, c2), cdc(c0, cdp2(c1, c2)), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)))
  dpmul10(c0, cdp2(c1, c2))
  mp2an(wcel(cdp2(c1, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  dp2cl(c1, c2)
  dfdec10(c0, cdp2(c1, c2))
  eqtr4i(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)), co(cdc(c0, c1), cdp, c2), co(cdc(c0, c1), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  3eqtr4ri(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2)), co(cdc(c0, c1), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  addassi(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), c1, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mulcli(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
  recni(c1)
  nn0rei(c1)
  divcli(c2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(c2)
  nncni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nnne0i(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
  oveq1i(cdc(c0, c1), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1))
  dfdec10(c0, c1)
  oveq2i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, cdp2(c1, c2), co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  df-dp2(c1, c2)
  dpval2(cdc(c0, c1), c2)
  deccl(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dpmul1000
blocks.content: Multiply by 1000 a decimal expansion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpmul1000(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, cdp, cdp2(c1, cdp2(c2, c3))), cmul, cdc(cdc(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0), nat0)), cdc(cdc(cdc(c0, c1), c2), c3))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cr)
